allow: Bash(python -c "import http.server; import socketserver; PORT = 8000; Handler = http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler; with socketserver.TCPServer\(\('''', PORT\), Handler\) as httpd: print\(f''Server running at http://localhost:{PORT}/''\); httpd.serve_forever\(\)")
Bash(powershell -Command "$wc = New-Object System.Net.WebClient; try { $wc.DownloadString\(''http://localhost:8000/''\) | Out-Null } catch { Write-Error $_Exception.Message }")
